name: Seated Triceps Press
how_to_perform:
1. Sit in a chair with the edge of the seat positioned just below your hip flexors.

2. Hold a dumbbell in each hand, with your palms facing backward and the weights resting atop your thighs.

3. Keeping your back straight, shoulders relaxed, and core engaged, press the dumbbells straight up over your head.

4. Lower the dumbbells behind your head, keeping your elbows close to your body, until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.

5. Push the dumbbells back up to the starting position.

6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: The Seated Triceps Press is an isolation exercise that targets the triceps muscles.
